title: SAMSUNG 700 L Frost Free Side by Side Refrigerator  (Gentle Silver Matt, RS72R5001M9/TL)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator Unit
User Manual
Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Spacious Interior with SpaceMax Technolo: The unique SpaceMax Technology, in this refrigerator, makes the walls much thinner to ensure a minimal amount of high-efficiency insulation. This gives you more storage space without altering the external dimensions or reducing energy efficiency.
product_description.All-around Cooling: The all-around cooling system continuously keeps a check on the temperature and blows out cold air. This helps evenly cool the fridge (including the corners) so that every food item stored inside stays fresh for a long time.

review:
Superb One Day Delivery! Elegant Matt Silverish finish !! Very silent operation! Ample storage with good quality shelves ! Bright LED in both compartments! Temperature setting inside the fridge so the outside looks clean l... Its a heavy fridge so ensure the logistic people get atleast 4 persons of the building doesn’t have lift to carry it..
Now waiting for the Samsung guy to come and inspect as a mandatory norm!

Will update more in month’s time ...👍🏻
Excellent fridge: quality make , nice mat finish colour , very spacious and value for money. Please have a clear measurement of your available space for it.

I am very happy to share the experience of my new Samsung beautiful and Big Refrigerator which is working excellent..Power input is only 150 watts which is unbelievable and too low...I am expecting low Electricity bill from this month. Thanks to the inverter Technology for the Compressor.
Thanks to Flipkart for timely delivery, Packaging was intact..Samsung Technicians service in starting the Refrigerator was also excellent.
Even though separate stabiliser not required, I am using the old stabilise which was earlier used for 250 litres refrigerator.

Impressive side by side refrigerator by Samsung. My review -
1. Looks very elegant with a Matt finish.
2. Huge space in both the fridge and the freezer side. The depth of the side bins are very good.
3. The fridge functions almost noiseless.
4. The temperature control panel is given inside, which is good thought as one doesn't need to keep changing it and it protects from accidental touch.
5. There is also a door open alarm which is a good utility.
6. The lights are bright.
7. Due to the side bins, pulling out the vegetable trays require the door to be open 180 deg, though this is not too much of an inconvenience.
8. The wire length is quite adequate to reach bottom or top plug point. It also does not require 15amp point making it convenient to be placed anywhere.

Flipkart had put up a Try & Buy offer which helped make the decision to buy easy. Superb delivery by Flipkart without any issue to the product considering that this is a huge refrigerator.

Overall Very satisfied with this purchase.
excellent & prompt delivery, installation Service by Flipkart. For product everything is excellent however I found that Vegetable tray plastic looks not strong enough.

Pros
Good Finish
Great capacity
Can adjust 20 litres water bottle
Touch pad to adjust temperatures for freezer and fridge
Door alarm in case you leave it open
Wheels and lock wheels.. makes easy fit one person to move it within the house.. one side movement from to back..

Cons -
Unwanted design to hand bottles but no hangers under the top right shelf
The room temperature has gone high because of the fridge emits too much heat..
Flipkart guys gor installation never shows up and if you call flipkart they will raise a ticket and give you an eta of 4 days means be ready to be without fridge for 4 to 5 days

Steps to be taken
1. Call samsung directly and get the installation done.. visit is scheduled in 48 hours but he actually came in 6 hours.

Wish they could have given more door shelve options to store more smaller bottles too which can be easily removable

Now we are using this refrigerator from past 10 days. It is best in class. Very spacious inside. Compartments are designed meticulously to accommodate maximum items. Features are too good. I liked vacation mode the most. Power consumption can be commented only after a month.Samsung service was good. Immediately arrived for installation. Explained all the features in detail. Extended warranty is quite costly. Overall a good experience. One time worth spend. In tropical hot weather for maximum food item spacious refrigerator becomes necessity.
Everything is good but if u see side body paint is just like look like as wardrobe paint finish and also look like as wardrobe..

The size of this elegant piece is a bit big. It occupies considerable space. Hence, we should have or identify a suitable place for this beautiful item in our houses before it actually arrives at our houses. A word of caution. The fridge, with its intact packing materials, will not pass through the conventional door frames at our houses, unless the door openings are wide in sizes. By and large there are no issues in transportation and installation. People are nice and very helpful. As of now we are very pleased and happy with this product.

Very spacious, stylish, elegant & cool product from Samsung. Best side by side door refrigerator in this budget segment. Samsung's space max technology is new innovation. 700 litres is really cool and lots of space. All round cooling feature keeps items fresh. Digital inverter compressor with 10 year warranty. Stylish both interior and exterior.

answers: A:150watt and it is rated 3 star, no idea about the units per day usage
A:Sorry you can't. The refrigerator & freezer should be used together or switched off together.
A:Lifting through narrow steps is not possible.
A:Yes. But you'll need professional help
A:Yes. Brand new. Received without a single dent.
A:No outside . but it has one on the inside right hand door for temperature display. No
A:Theres no star rating on this refrigerator
A:It’s left side is freezer and right side is refrigerator. This is not a convertible product.
A:Does not require stabilizer, it already has an inbuilt stabilizer
A:Net internal depth is 40cm for trays. Net depth for vegetable box is 48cm
A:Around 350 to 450 units based on your usage (door openings).
A:Absolutely no problem in fitting it in a standard lift with capacity of 8 people. There is no need to dis-assemble the unit
A:There is a lock feature for buttons inside.
A:5 star very good fridge and lot of space and nice cooling effect too. Spacious
A:In any freeze stand is not recommended by company. No need stabilizer.
